title: The terms for this service are easy to read

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read
tosdr.tldr: Grammarly's Privacy Policy is easy to read. It is not very long, nor do they use overly-complicated, unnecessary legal jargon except when absolutely necessary.
